search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Patreon (patreon.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official Patreon pricing page can be accessed at [https://www.patreon.com/pricing](https://www.patreon.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

![Image 26: Starting a Patreon is free](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Patreon_website_Module2_2x_wide_72dpi_0021_Background_copy_8_7aff7637b5.jpg)

Starting a Patreon is free
==========================

Access tools to share work directly with your fans right away. Introduce paid options to your members when you're ready.

Powerful core features
----------------------

When you sign up for Patreon, you get instant access to a powerful set of features for free:

01.

Multimedia publishing

02.

Native video & previews

03.

Exclusive podcast feeds

04.

Personalization options

05.

Analytics & insights

Multimedia publishing

![Image 27](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Editor_e8f4882549.png)

![Image 28](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Creator_World_af0d2f1d41.png)

![Image 29](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Creator_World_2_9b027efeff.png)

![Image 30](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Creator_World_Editing_ac19a830df.png)

![Image 31](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Insights_0749b671ad.png)

![Image 32: Earning made easy](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Mobile_Membership_Options_d8b3ae1e7e.png)

![Image 33: Earning made easy](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Mobile_Viewer_3_41c3d93d80.png)

Earning made easy
-----------------

Ready to start earning on Patreon? You can offer a paid membership with fully customizable benefits, sell individual digital exclusives like videos or podcast episodes in your own online shop, or a combination of both.

Paid membership
===============

Choose the plan that’s right for you  
and only pay based on what you earn.

Most Popular

Pro
---

A core set of tools to help you earn an income for your creative work directly from your community.

8%
--

of the income you earn on Patreon

plus [payment processing, currency conversion, and payout fees, and applicable taxes.](https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/11111747095181)

*   Monthly and annual subscriptions
*   Membership tiers
*   Free trials and special offers
*   Priority customer support
*   Engagement tools (chats, DMs, comments)
*   Member analytics and insights

[Create on Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/create)

Premium
-------

An enhanced set of tools to help you earn an income for your creative work directly from your community and grow your creative business.

12%
---

of the income you earn on Patreon

plus [payment processing, currency conversion, and payout fees, and applicable taxes.](https://support.patreon.com/hc/en-us/articles/11111747095181)

*   Everything from Pro, plus:
*   Dedicated partner manager
*   Team accounts
*   Merch for membership

[Create on Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/create)

Commerce
--------

Quickly and easily sell digital products directly on Patreon

5%
--

of your monthly sales earnings, plus payment processing, currency conversion, payout fees, and applicable taxes.

![Image 34](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Shop_2_9c05808eed.png)

![Image 35](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Editor_2_b56906ecbc.png)

![Image 36](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Shop_3_8d73e0d6b8.png)

![Image 37](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_PDP_e984ccc963.png)

![Image 38](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Insights_2_5aae330249.png)

![Image 39](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_Desktop_Editor_3_1c0481c6fb.png)

Quickly and easily sell digital products directly on Patreon

01.

Unlimited products, no listing fees

02.

Hosting for all media types

03.

Dedicated shop tab on your page

04.

Product detail pages

05.

Sales analytics and insights

06.

Promotional tools

Unlimited products, no listing fees

5%
--

of your monthly sales earnings, plus payment processing, currency conversion, payout fees, and applicable taxes.

Payments powered by Patreon
---------------------------

Patreon has processed billions of dollars in payments to millions of creators for the last decade. Here’s a peek at what happens behind the scenes to make sure you get paid securely and reliably.

![Image 40: credit-card-1.svg](https://c14.patreon.com/credit_card_1_674b9ced81.svg)

Trusted payments provider
-------------------------

Patreon continuously meets the highest global certification and compliance standards to ensure your payments are secure.

![Image 41: dollar-coin.svg](https://c14.patreon.com/dollar_coin_b7dbc0768c.svg)

Global currency conversion
--------------------------

Your pricing is automatically converted to your customers’ local currencies to facilitate international payments.

![Image 42: shield-3.svg](https://c14.patreon.com/shield_3_e5d2331ec6.svg)

24/7 fraud monitoring
---------------------

Fraud gets caught before it hits your balance so you never have to worry about it.

![Image 43: bill-dollar-4.svg](https://c14.patreon.com/bill_dollar_4_c1edd7fb23.svg)

Multiple payment methods
------------------------

A wide range of payment methods are accepted on Patreon, including PayPal, major credit cards, and Venmo.

![Image 44: user-check-validate.svg](https://c14.patreon.com/user_check_validate_cac6bda935.svg)

Streamlined checkout
--------------------

A simple checkout experience and quick authorization process make it easy for you to earn directly from fans.

![Image 45: non-commercial-dollars.svg](https://c14.patreon.com/non_commercial_dollars_995386a81c.svg)

Recover failed payments
-----------------------

Declined payments get chased down with smart retries and reminders for expired cards.

![Image 46: americanexpress.png](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_americanexpress_191564ed64.png)![Image 47: mastercard.png](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_mastercard_ab96933921.png)![Image 48: discover.png](https://c14.patreon.com/thumbnail_discover_26a785e2ef.png)![Image 49: visa.png](https://c14.patreon.com/visa_8a68d7c453.png)![Image 50: paypal.png](https://c14.patreon.com/paypal_cc076d1bee.png)

![Image 51](https://c5.patreon.com/external/marketing/new_marketing_pages/logomark-animated.webp)

#### Your world to create

[Get started](https://www.patreon.com/create)

Already have an account? [Log in](https://patreon.com/login)

[![Image 52: Get it on Google Play](https://c14.patreon.com/google_app_store_button_white_en_US_f4a6014a79.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.patreon.android "Get it on Google Play")[![Image 53: Download on the App Store](https://c14.patreon.com/apple_app_store_button_white_en_US_cc657b8391.png)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/patreon/id1044456188 "Download on the App Store")

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Patreon charges a percentage of earnings as fees, with additional processing and conversion fees.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: A core set of tools to help you earn an income for your creative work directly from your community.
An enhanced set of tools to help you earn an income for your creative work directly from your community and grow your creative business.
Quickly and easily sell digital products directly on Patreon.

additional_fees.fee_description: Fees for processing payments, currency conversion, and payouts.
